mapper.select: SELECT BAS.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , BAS.COPN_DV_CD /* 법인격구분코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'COPN_DV_CD', BAS.COPN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS COPN_DV_NM /* 법인격구분명 */ , DTL.CST_GD_CD /* 고객등급코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CST_GD_CD', DTL.CST_GD_CD, #{session.langId}) AS CST_GD_NM /* 고객등급명 */ , BAS.CST_KNM AS CST_NM /* 고객한글명 */ , BAS.BRYY_MMDD /* 생년월일 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SEX_DV_CD', BAS.SEX_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SEX_DV_NM /* 성별구분명 */ , BAS.SEX_DV_CD /* 성별구분코드 */ , ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS ZIP /* 우편번호 */ , ADR.RNADR AS BAS_ADR /* 기본주소 */ , ADR.RDADR AS DTL_ADR /* 상세주소 */ , CASE WHEN ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP IS NOT NULL THEN '(' || ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP || ') ' END || ADR.RNADR || ' ' || ADR.RDADR AS ADR /* 주소 */ , BAS.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , BAS.MEXNO_ENCR , BAS.CRAL_IDV_TNO , '' AS MPNO , HPNO.LOCARA_TNO AS HP_LOCARA_TNO , HPNO.EXNO_ENCR AS HP_ENCR , HPNO.IDV_TNO AS HP_IDV_TNO , '' AS HPNO , CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_BCBC_DRM_CTF_IS_IZ IZ WHERE 1=1 AND IZ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND IZ.PROCS_YN = 'Y' AND IZ.SFK_VAL IS NOT NULL AND IZ.SFK_VAL != BAS.SFK_VAL AND IZ.OJPS_KNM = BAS.CST_KNM AND IZ.BRYY_MMDD = BAS.BRYY_MMDD AND DECODE(IZ.SEX_DV_CD,'0','2','1') = BAS.SEX_DV_CD AND IZ.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = BAS.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND IZ.MEXNO_ENCR = BAS.MEXNO_ENCR AND IZ.CRAL_IDV_TNO = BAS.CRAL_IDV_TNO) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SAFE_KEY_DUP_YN FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS BAS INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_DTL DTL ON DTL.CST_NO = BAS.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS ADR ON BAS.ADR_ID = ADR.ADR_ID AND ADR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_CTPLC_BAS HPNO ON HPNO.CST_CTPLC_OJ_REFK_VAL = BAS.CST_NO AND HPNO.CST_CTPLC_OJ_DV_CD = '01' /* 고객 */ AND HPNO.CTPLC_TP_CD = '04' /* 자택전화번호 */ AND HPNO.HIST_END_DTM = '99991231235959' WHERE 1=1 -- AND BAS.COPN_DV_CD = '1' /* 고객유형(개인) */ AND BAS.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND (BAS.CST_KNM = #{cstNm} OR BAS.CST_ENM = #{cstNm}) /* 고객명 */ AND BAS.BRYY_MMDD = #{bryyMmdd} /* 생년월일 */ AND BAS.SEX_DV_CD = #{sexDvCd} /* 성별 */

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD IN ('2', '6') /* 2: 렌탈/리스, 6: 정기배송 */ AND T2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD NOT IN ('301','302','303') /* 현재 유효한 계약상태 */ THEN T2.FNL_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS THIS_RENTAL_AMT , MAX(T3.PY_AMT) AS PY_AMT , MAX(T4.CANCEL_FEE_AMT) AS CANCEL_FEE_AMT , MAX(T4.CANCEL_COUNT) AS CANCEL_COUNT , MAX(T5.DLQ_AMT) AS DLQ_AMT , MAX(T5.DLQ_MCN) AS DLQ_MCN , MAX(T5.DLQ_PD_COUNT) AS DLQ_PD_COUNT , MAX(T5.FNL_PY_DT) AS FNL_PY_DT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 ON T6.PD_CD = T2.BASE_PD_CD AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL(SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN RVE_AMT ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('2', '4') THEN RVE_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS PY_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) T3 /* 납입완료*/ ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL(SELECT NVL(SUM(RVE_AMT), 0) AS CANCEL_FEE_AMT , COUNT(DISTINCT (CNTR_NO || CNTR_SN)) AS CANCEL_COUNT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND RVE_DV_CD = '07' /* '07' : 위약금 */ AND CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) T4 /* 위약금 */ ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL(SELECT NVL(SUM(A.EOT_DLQ_AMT), 0) AS DLQ_AMT , NVL(SUM(A.DLQ_MCN), 0) AS DLQ_MCN , COUNT(DISTINCT (A.CNTR_NO || A.CNTR_SN)) AS DLQ_PD_COUNT , MAX((SELECT MAX(DP_DT) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3'))) AS FNL_PY_DT FROM TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS A WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'YYYYMM') AND A.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) T5 /* 연체 */ ON 1=1 WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo}

SELECT CNTR_CST_NO , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , CNTR_RCP_FSH_DT , IST_CST_KNM , PD_CD , PD_NM , CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD , CNTR_PRGS_STAT_NM , SELL_TP_CD FROM (SELECT T1.CNTR_CST_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T2.CNTR_SN , SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM,1,8) AS CNTR_RCP_FSH_DT , T4.RCGVP_KNM AS IST_CST_KNM , T5.PD_CD , T5.PD_NM , T1.CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD', T1.CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD, #{session.langId}) AS CNTR_PRGS_STAT_NM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM DESC, T2.CNTR_NO, T2.CNTR_SN) AS ORDER_SEQ , T2.SELL_TP_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 ON T3.DTL_CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTL_CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T3.VL_END_DTM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T3.VL_STRT_DTM <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 ON T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T5 ON T5.PD_CD = T2.BASE_PD_CD AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM IS NOT NULL AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND T1.CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('20', '30', '40', '50', '60') ) WHERE ORDER_SEQ <= 5 ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ

SELECT WK_EXCN_DT , SERVICE_GB , CNTR_NO , PD_GRP_NM , PD_NM , PART_PD_NM , CNTR_SN FROM (SELECT T.WK_EXCN_DT , T.SERVICE_GB , T.CNTR_NO , LISTAGG(DISTINCT T.PD_GRP_NM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.CNTR_NO || T.CNTR_SN) AS PD_GRP_NM , LISTAGG(DISTINCT T.PD_NM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.CNTR_NO || T.CNTR_SN) AS PD_NM , LISTAGG(DISTINCT T.PART_PD_NM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.CNTR_NO || T.CNTR_SN) AS PART_PD_NM , LISTAGG(T.CNTR_SN, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.CNTR_SN) AS CNTR_SN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.WK_EXCN_DT DESC, T.SERVICE_GB) AS ORDER_SEQ FROM ( SELECT T1.WK_EXCN_DT , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS','SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SERVICE_GB , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS','PD_GRP_CD', T3.PD_PRP_VAL20, #{session.langId}) AS PD_GRP_NM , T5.PD_CD , T5.PD_NM || CASE WHEN INSTR(T5.PD_NM, T6.PD_PRP_VAL07) = 0 THEN '(' || T6.PD_PRP_VAL07 || ')' END AS PD_NM , T31.PD_NM AS PART_PD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 ON T3.PD_CD = T2.PDCT_PD_CD AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T31 ON T31.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T31.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T5 ON T5.PD_CD = T4.BASE_PD_CD AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T6 ON T6.PD_CD = T5.PD_CD AND T6.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'IND' AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo} UNION ALL SELECT T1.WK_EXCN_DT , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS','SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', '2', #{session.langId}) AS SERVICE_GB , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS','PD_GRP_CD', T3.PD_PRP_VAL20, #{session.langId}) AS PD_GRP_NM -- 상품종류(서비스에서 상품그룹으로 부름) , T5.PD_CD , T5.PD_NM || CASE WHEN INSTR(T5.PD_NM, T6.PD_PRP_VAL07) = 0 THEN '(' || T6.PD_PRP_VAL07 || ')' END AS PD_NM , T31.PD_NM AS PART_PD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 ON T3.PD_CD = T2.PDCT_PD_CD AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T31 ON T31.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T31.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T5 ON T5.PD_CD = T4.BASE_PD_CD AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T6 ON T6.PD_CD = T5.PD_CD AND T6.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'IND' AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND (T1.CNTR_NO, T1.CNTR_SN) IN (SELECT B.CNTR_NO , B.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS A INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B ON B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo}) ) T WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY T.WK_EXCN_DT , T.SERVICE_GB , T.CNTR_NO ) WHERE ORDER_SEQ <= 5 ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ

SELECT T5.PD_CD , T5.PD_NM , T2.SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T2.SELL_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SELL_TP_NM , T2.FNL_AMT , T4.RCGVP_KNM , T6.PRTNR_KNM , NVL(TO_CHAR(CASE WHEN T7.RENTAL_TN = 0 THEN NULL WHEN T7.RENTAL_TN + 1 > T2.CNTR_PTRM THEN T2.CNTR_PTRM ELSE T7.RENTAL_TN + 1 END), '-') AS RENTAL_TN /* 렌탈사용기간 */ , CASE WHEN NVL(T2.CNTR_PTRM, '999') = 999 THEN '-' ELSE TO_CHAR(T2.CNTR_PTRM) END AS CNTR_PTRM /* 전체계약기간 */ , CASE WHEN NVL(T61.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N,0) > 0 THEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT,'YYYYMMDD'), NVL(T61.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N,0)),'YYYYMM') ELSE '' END AS FRISU_BFSVC_ENDDT /* 무상멤버십종료일 */ , T2.SV_PRD , (SELECT MAX(VST_CNFMDT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ WHERE ASN_OJ_YM <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) AS LAST_BS , (SELECT MIN(VST_DUEDT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ WHERE VST_DUEDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) AS NEXT_BS , T2.CNTR_NO , T2.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM , T1.CNTR_CST_NO , '' AS EXPIRE_SOON_YN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO /* 현재보유상품만 해당 - 일시불만 '401' 허용 */ AND T2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD NOT IN ('301','302','303', (CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD != '1' THEN '401' ELSE '301' END)) AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 ON T3.DTL_CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTL_CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T3.VL_END_DTM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T3.VL_STRT_DTM <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 ON T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T5 ON T5.PD_CD = T2.BASE_PD_CD AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T6 ON T6.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM,1,6) AND T6.OG_TP_CD = T1.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND T6.PRTNR_NO = T1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T61 ON T61.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T61.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T61.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T7 ON T7.SL_CL_YM = (SELECT MAX(SL_CL_YM) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AND T7.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM IS NOT NULL AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo} ORDER BY T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM DESC , T2.CNTR_NO DESC , T2.CNTR_SN
